ModMetaData.name: FFGermanShepherd Caravaneer re-upload
ModMetaData.author: forestfey, Lazuli, SemoMonkey
ModMetaData.description: Adds a new dogbreed, the German Shepherd or Alsatian, modded as a slightly more combat-capable and thus, expensive Husky. Selfmade texture. Acts as pack animal in a caravan, complete with modified pack textures... now even more fitting!
